parse.title: List of Playboy Playmates of the Month

text.*:
The following women have appeared in the American edition of Playboy magazine as Playmate of the Month. Those who were also named Playmate of the Year are highlighted in green.

Contents

  • 1 1953–1959
  • 2 1960–1969
  • 3 1970–1979
  • 4 1980–1989
  • 5 1990–1999
  • 6 2000–2009
  • 7 2010–present
  • 8 See also
  • 9 External links

1959 Virginia Gordon Eleanor Bradley Audrey Daston Nancy Crawford Cindy Fuller Marilyn Hanold Yvette Vickers Clayre Peters Marianne Gaba Elaine Reynolds Donna Lynn Ellen Stratton

Note: Ellen Stratton was the first official Playmate of the Year.
